screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .sesx file in Adobe Audition 2023
screenshot.caption: SESX file open in Adobe Audition 2023

description: Adobe introduced the SESX format when it released version 3.0 of Audition in November 2007. The format replaced the .SES format, a binary format that was the default audio project file type used by earlier versions of Audition.
To create an SESX file with Audition, select File → New → Multitrack Session... . You can customize various settings for modifying audio in SESX projects.
You can also import many different types of audio formats into the projects, such as .AIF , .FLAC , .AAC , .OGG , .WAV , .OMF , and .MP3 . To import an audio file in Audition, select File → Import .

images.alt: Screenshot of a .sesx file in Adobe Audition 2023
